## Overview

### 

This dashboard summarizes an illuminating analysis of fuel economy of cars.

### 

This is a car.

## Plots

### Scatter

```{r}
#| title: Highway vs. city mileage
ggplot(mpg, aes(x = cty, y = hwy)) +
  geom_point()
```

### Bar

```{r}
#| title: Drive types
ggplot(mpg, aes(x = drv)) +
  geom_bar()
```
